142660.「<pc>。\n 私に 何かしてほしいことは あるかしら？\n<break>:
<pc> I'm sorry. Is there anything you want me to
do?<break>

142675.「<pc>。私が作った 妖精の苗木は\n 手伝ってくれる内容に応じて ５種類ある:
I made five kinds of fairy saplings. I've created five types of fairy saplings, depending on what you need help with...
First, I chose "get a sapling"...

142676.「あなたに手伝ってほしいのは 『おうえんする』\n 『モンスターをなでる』『おひ:
We need your help with "cheering", "petting monsters", "twisting", "gesturing", and "chatting"... Each sapling produces five
berries, so if you do all five of these, you'll get 25 berries. If you do all five, you'll get 25 berries... and in exchange for
the berries, I'll give you a thank-you gift, so if you want to get lots of thank-you gifts, you'll have to help me with all five.
Also, the "gesture" and "chat" sessions have pre-determined times... You can't participate in those two after the opening hours, so be
careful... You can check the time by clicking on "Listen to the explanation".

142677.<attr><feel_angry_lv2><end_attr>「それじゃ ない:
<attr><feel_angry_lv2><end_attr>That's not right! If you don't want to get
your armpits tickled, you'll have to be more
serious!

142679.「ほかに 何か私にしてほしいことは ある？\n<break>: Is there anything else you want me to do?<break>

142680.「それじゃ 手伝ってくれるものを 教えて？\n 内容に対応した 苗木を渡すわ。\:
So, you want to tell me what you can help me
with? I'll get you a sapling that matches the
description...<break>

142681.「チャットを してきてくれるのね。\n こっちでは チャットって\n コミュニケ:
Why don't you go and chat with him? Chatting is a form of communication over here, isn't it? I thought it would be fun and happy if we
all got together in the same place and chatted. So I've decided on a time and place for that.

142682.「この中から 好きな時間を １回選んで\n <%sM_STAGE>で\n チャッ:
Pick any one of these times, and go chat at <%sM_STAGE>! Just say either "<%sM_CHAT1>" or "<%sM_CHAT2>"... You can say either
"<%sM_CHAT1>" or "<%sM_CHAT2>"... but the chat must be set to "around", so be careful...

142683.「チャットを１回達成して 妖精の苗木に実が５つ\n ついた状態になったら そこの:
Once you've completed one chat, and your fairy sapling has five berries on it, talk to Nora the slime there and try to harvest the
berries.

142684.「あら……？\n あなたは すでに苗木を持っているわよ？: Oh...? You already have a sapling, don't you?

142685.「あら そう。やめるのね。\n 何をすれば 今 持っている苗木が成長するかは\n:
Oh, my... Don't... If you want to know what you need to do to make your sapling grow, you can go to the big stuff... If you want to
know how long the gesture and chat will take, you can try using the fairy sapling from the precious, or you can ask for instructions...

142686.※テキスト削除\n「それに その苗木……実が５つなってるようよ！\n ５つ 実を:
Text deleted. And that sapling... It looks like it has five berries! A sapling that bears five berries is ready to be harvested,
so you must talk to Nora the slime to harvest them. I'll return the favor in exchange for the berries I've collected. When you've
finished harvesting, talk to me again and select the option "Trade berries for rewards."

142687.「オーケー！ わかったわ。\n じゃあ 今 あなたが持っている苗木は\n 私が:
Okay! I see... Then I'll throw away the
sapling you have now...

142688.「それに その苗木は成長させてる途中のようね？\n 今 持っている苗木を\n 別:
And it looks like the sapling is in the process of growing? So we can replace the sapling we have with another one, right?
However, if there are any berries on the sapling, they will disappear, so you should consider... Exchange it for another sapling?

142689.「なでるのね。こっちでは 仲間モンスターを\n なでられると 幸せな気持ちになれ:
Petting... Over here, if you pet a fellow monster, it makes you feel happy, right? So if you pet someone's monster five times...
But you can't pet the same person's monster multiple times... Or petting your own monster... Happiness has to go to five
different people! Can you help me pet my monsters?

142690.「なでるのを５回達成して 妖精の苗木に実が５つ\n ついた状態になったら そこの:
When you've completed five strokes and your
fairy sapling has five berries on it, talk to
Nora the slime there and harvest the berries.<bw_break>

142692.「おひねりをしてくるのね わかったわ。\n トップ１０掲示板で おひねりをされる:
You're gonna give me a twist. I know... It makes you happy when someone twists your arm on a top ten board, doesn't it? Well... I'll
give you any number of tweezes for posts that you like. Just one of them. Besides, I've heard that message boards can be fun to look
at. How about it? Can you help me put a twist on it?

142693.「おひねりをしてくるのね わかったわ。\n トップ１０掲示板で おひねりされると:
You're gonna give me a twist. I know... It makes you happy when someone twists your hand on the Top 10 board, doesn't it? I don't
know. But you've already done it. Then I'll give you this sapling!

142694.酒場や町の入り口にある 『まちかど掲示板』に\nアクセスして みんなのお知らせ広:
If you go to the "Machikado BBS" at the
entrance of a bar or town, you can post a
message on the Top 10 BBS...

142695.「おひねりを１回達成して 妖精の苗木に実が５つ\n ついた状態になったら そこの:
When you've achieved one of the twists, and your fairy sapling has five berries on it, talk to Nora, the slime there, and harvest
the berries.

142696.「その苗木は すでに 収穫できる状態だから\n スライムのノラに話しかけて 収穫:
The saplings are already ready for harvest, so I'll talk to Nora the slime and we'll harvest them... And I will return the favor
in exchange for the berries...

142697.「おうえんね。こっちでは おうえんされると\n 幸せな気持ちに なれるんでしょ？:
Oh... Over here, it makes you feel happy to be cheered, right? So if you cheer someone up five times... If you're not fighting, you can
also cheer for someone who's fishing, or a craftsman in the craftsmen's guild. However... But... I don't want you to fight
the same person over and over again. Happiness has to go to five different people! What do you think? Can you help me cheer them
up?

142698.「おうえんを５回達成して 妖精の苗木に実が５つ\n ついた状態になったら そこの:
When the fairy sapling has five berries, talk
to Nora the slime there and harvest the
berries.<bw_break>

142699.「しぐさをするのね わかったわ。\n こっちでは しぐさって\n コミュニケーシ:
You make gestures. I know. Over here, gestures are a form of communication, right? If we all gather in the same place and do the
gesture, it will make us happy and joyful. So we decided on a time and place for that.

142700.特定のしぐさを おこないたい場合は\nさくせんコマンドの いろいろ設定の\nよく:
If you want to perform a specific action, you can register it by going to the operation command's various settings and setting up
your most used lines... You can also check the time of the event by talking to Amaryllis and asking her for an explanation, or by
using the Fairy Seedling Purple...

142701.「この中から 好きな時間を １回選んで\n <%sM_STAGE>で\n <%s:
Pick any one of these times, and go do <%sM_SHIGUSA> on <%sM_STAGE>! If you don't have the appropriate gesture, I've heard
there's someone somewhere who'll exchange it for a valuable medal, or give you something in return...

142702.「しぐさを１回達成して 妖精の苗木に実が５つ\n ついた状態になったら そこのス:
When the fairy sapling has five berries, talk
to Nora, the slime there, and harvest the
berries.

142703.「それじゃ この苗木を あなたに渡すわ。: Then I'll give you this sapling...

142704.「あら？ あなたは 今持っている苗木のほかは\n 手伝えるものがないようよ。\n:
Oh? You don't have anything to give except your current saplings... Once you've harvested the plants, you can't give them
away... I'm sorry, but even if some of them are overdue, I can't participate anymore...

142705.「あら？ あなたは 手伝えるものがないようよ。\n 一度 収穫した苗木は もう渡:
What? You have nothing to tell me... Once you've harvested the saplings, you can't give them away... I'm sorry, but if any of these
are overdue, you can no longer participate...

142710.「私に 何かしてほしいことがあれば\n いつでも 話しかけなさい。\n<bw_b:
If there's anything you need me to do, you
can always talk to me...<bw_break>

142711.「どの 説明を聞きたいの？\n<break>: Which explanation do you want to hear?<break>

142712.「ほかに 何か聞きたいことはある？\n<break>: Is there anything else you want to ask me?<break>

142713.「チャットは あらかじめ\n 開催時間が 決まっているわ。: I'm sure you've heard of it.

142714.「この中から 好きな時間を １回選んで\n <%sM_STAGE>で\n 『まわ:
Pick any one of these times, and go chat with <%sM_STAGE> in the "Around" setting! Just say either "<%sM_CHAT1>" or "<%sM_CHAT2>"... But
it won't do you any good if you don't have the right sapling, so you'll have to choose "Get a sapling" and then chat after you get
it...

142715.「みんなに 幸せを届けて\n 苗木を成長させたら いよいよ 収穫よ！\n<br>:
Once you've brought happiness to everyone and made your sapling grow, it's time to harvest! Once a sapling has produced five berries,
it's ready to be harvested, so you'll need to talk to Nora the slime to harvest them. And in exchange for the berries you collect, I
will give you...

142716.「あなたに渡す妖精の苗木は 皆の幸せな気持ちで\n 成長し 実をつけていく特別な:
The fairy sapling I'm giving you is a special seedling that will grow and bear fruit with the happiness of all... I've worked my magic
to create... There are five types of saplings, depending on what you can help me with. I'll make them grow and grow and grow,
making everyone around them happy. Each sapling produces five berries, so if you help me with all five, I'll give you 25 berries.
If you do all five, you'll get 25 berries... and in exchange for the berries, I'll give you a thank-you gift, so if you want to get a
lot of thank-you gifts, you'll have to help me with all five. You can find out what you need to do to make the fairy sapling grow by
looking at the most important things you have.

142717.「しぐさは あらかじめ\n 開催時間が 決まっているわ。:
The gesture will be held at a predetermined
time...

142718.「この中から 好きな時間を １回選んで\n <%sM_STAGE>で\n <%s:
Pick any one of these times and go <%sM_STAGE> and <%sM_SHIGUSA>! But it won't do you any good if you don't have the right
sapling, so choose "Get a sapling" and then do the gesture after you get it...

142720.<attr><feel_angry_lv2><end_attr>「ハァ？ なんで: <attr><feel_angry_lv2><end_attr>Huh? Why would I...<pc> Why do I have to make small talk with you?<bw_break>

142721.<attr><feel_angry_lv2><end_attr>「ハァ？ なんで:
Huh? Why would I... I'm going back to Fairyland. I'm going back to Fairyland sooner or later, so if you don't have time for that, why don't you go and work
hard for me...

142722.「ピキー！ ボクは アマリリスさんに\n 収穫を手伝いなさいって ムリヤリ\n:
Pikey! I'm a good slime who was coerced by Amaryllis into helping with the harvest. I'm a good slime, brought here by Amaryllis to
help with the harvest. Anyway, can I see your sapling?

142723.「また 収穫したい時は\n ボクに 話しかけてね。:
If you ever want to harvest again, just let
me know.

142724.「わかったよ！ 収穫なら まかせて！\n アマリリスさんに みっちり ２４時間\:
All right, all right! I'll take care of the harvest! Ms. Amaryllis has been working with me for the past 24 hours, teaching me how to
harvest... Let's see...

142725.「すごーい すごいよー！！\n きれいな実が５つ ちゃんと なっているね。\n:
It's amazing! It's amazing! There are five
beautiful berries growing here. ... Now, wait
a minute...

142726.スライムは 慣れた様子で\n苗木から 実を収穫すると\n<pc>に 渡してくれた:
The slime seemed used to it
When you harvest the fruit from a sapling
<pc>  I'll give it to...<pc> I got five fairy nuts!<se System 7><end>

142727.「それじゃ 残った苗木は\n ボクが ペロッと いただいておくね。:
Then I'll just take the rest of the
saplings...

142728.「ピキキー！ きれいな実が５つ なっているね。\n ……でも 残念。\n どうぐ:
Pikikey! There are five beautiful berries... But... But... But there's no room in the toolbox. I have to give you the berries so
you can make room in your toolbox and talk to me again.

142729.「……あれれ？\n キミ 今は 苗木を持っていないようだよ？\n<br>\n「も:
... What? You don't seem to have any saplings right now, do you? If there's anything I can do to help, just talk to Ms. Amaryllis, and
she'll help you get a sapling.

142730.「……あれれ？ キミが持ってる苗木は\n まだ 実が５つ なっていないようだよ？:
... What? The sapling you're holding hasn't produced five berries yet, has it? Bring happiness to everyone and make the sapling
grow. You can use the fairy sapling to see what you need to do to make it grow. If there's anything else you don't understand,
talk to Amaryllis and ask her for an explanation.

145080.「収穫した 妖精の実と\n お礼のアイテムを 交換するのね。\n<bw_brea:
I'll trade you the fairy berries I harvest
for the items you give me in return.<bw_break>

145081.※テキスト削除\n「あら あなた。妖精の苗木が つけた実と\n お礼アイテムを:
Text deleted. I traded the berries my fairy sapling bore for a thank-you item. Once a sapling has borne five berries, it is ready
to be harvested, and you can talk to the slime there and harvest the berries. And then you'd talk to the slime and you'd harvest the
berries and I'd give you...

146028.決められた時間と場所で 指定のチャットをすると\n成長し 実をつける苗木のようだ:
A sapling that grows and bears fruit when you chat with it at the designated time and place... I haven't seen a single fruit yet.
You choose one of these times and places, you set the chat to "around," and then you chat...

146029.決められた時間と場所で 指定のしぐさをすると\n成長し 実をつける苗木のようだ。:
It's a sapling that grows and bears fruit when you do the right thing at the right time and place. There are no fruits yet... Choose
one of these times and places, and perform the gesture at the designated time and place.

146030.「あら？ それは もう手伝ってくれたようよ？\n 悪いけど 一度収穫した苗木は\:
Oh? It looks like you already helped me with
that. I'm sorry, but once we've harvested the

146031.「あら？ それは もう\n 開催時間が 終了しちゃったようよ？\n 悪いけど も:
What? I'm sorry, but it looks like we're out
of time. I'm sorry, but I can't...<bw_break>

146032.なんと スライムは 実を収穫した 妖精の苗木を\n食べてしまった！:
Oh, my God, the slime ate the fairy sapling
that bore the fruit!

146033.「妖精の実は アマリリスさんに話しかけて\n 『実とお礼を交換する』を選ぶと\n:
If you talk to Amaryllis and select the
"exchange the fruit for a reward" option,
she'll give you an item in exchange.

146034.「そうそう それから……\n 私が アストルティアに滞在しているのは\n <%n:
Oh yeah, and... I'll be in Astoltia until the <%nM_MONTH>day of the <%nM_DAY>month (<%sM_WEEK>)... After that, I'm going back to

146036.開催時間は アマリリスに話しかけ\n『説明を聞く』で見るか 妖精の苗木・緑を\n:
You can find out when it's happening by
talking to Amaryllis and asking her about it,
or by using the fairy sapling green...

146037.「そうそう それから……\n 私が アストルティアに滞在しているのは\n <%n:
Oh yeah, and... I'll be in Astoltia until the <%nM_MONTH>day of the <%nM_DAY>month (<%sM_WEEK>)... After that, I'll be back in
fairyland, so I won't be able to exchange thanks... At best, be careful...

146122.「さてと…… あなたには 笑ってあげないと\n いけないんだったわね。はぁ……。:
Well... I'm supposed to smile at you...
Huh... Well, I'll only do it once, so you'll
just have to watch closely...

146130.「そうね…… <pc>。\n あなた あんことクリーム どっちが好き？\n ちな:
I guess<pc> What do you like? Which do you like better,
anko or cream? By the way, I like...<bw_break>

146131.<attr><feel_angry_lv2><end_attr>「ハァ！？ アマ:
Huh? Amaryllis, don't look at me like you're surprised. Do you want to be tickled in the armpit? Anko is the perfect sweetness that
spreads in your mouth. That's... This is what small talk is like...

146132.「そうね…… <pc>。\n あなた シュミとかってある？\n 私のシュミは ま:
I guess I'm sorry. Do you have a secret life? My secret is that I'm a prankster. I also like to cook, and when I'm tired of pranks, I'll
make something fancy. My specialty is the red fairy's special piri piri...

146133.<attr><feel_angry_lv2><end_attr>「ハァ！？ アマ:
Huh? Amaryllis, don't look at me like you're surprised. Do you want to be tickled in the armpit? I can at least cook! I'm not. This is

146419.※テキスト削除\n「あなたに手伝ってほしいのは 『おうえんする』\n 『モンスタ:

150140.「まぁ あなた。すべての手伝いを こなして\n 苗木を ぜ～んぶ 収穫してくれた:
Well... You've done all the work, you've harvested all the saplings... You're good! And that's it for this time. I'll expect you
to work as my hands and feet again next time!

150141.「まぁ！ あなたが持っている その苗木。\n 実が ５つなっているじゃない！！\:
Oh, my God! You've got... You've got five berries! The sapling is ready to be harvested, so I need you to talk to Nora, the
slime, who is standing next to me, and harvest them. When you've finished harvesting, talk to me again and select
"Exchange fruit for reward." I'll reward you for the fruit you've collected.

150181.「……って 思ったけど あなたとなら\n 少しくらい お話しするのも悪くないわね:
I thought... I was thinking that it wouldn't
hurt to have a little chat with you.<bw_break>

150547.<attr><feel_angry_lv2><end_attr>「ハァ！？ 今さ:
<attr><feel_angry_lv2><end_attr>Huh? You're not thinking of stopping helping
me now, are you? Just do as I say!

150548.「そうそう それから あなた……\n すべての手伝いをこなして 苗木を\n 全部:
Oh, yeah, and you... You do all the work, you harvest all the saplings... You're good! I'm done helping you this time, but I'm staying
in Astoltia until <%nM_MONTH>MONDAY. After that, I'll have to return to Fairyland, so I
won't be able to exchange gifts... At best, be careful...
